scan_metadata.description: kafka - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check encryption at rest with CMK
check_functions.description: Checks if cluster encryption at rest uses CMK

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check enhanced monitoring enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if enhanced monitoring is enabled for cluster

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check in-transit encryption enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if in-transit encryption is enabled for cluster

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check public accessibility
check_functions.description: Checks if cluster is publicly accessible

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check mutual TLS authentication enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if mutual TLS authentication is enabled for cluster

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check unrestricted access disabled
check_functions.description: Checks if unrestricted access is disabled for cluster

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check latest version usage
check_functions.description: Checks if cluster uses the latest version

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check connector in-transit encryption enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if connector in-transit encryption is enabled
